game.name: Escape from Naraka
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Escape from Naraka는 지옥 같은 분위기를 선사하는 1인칭 액션 플랫폼 게임입니다. 낯선 왕국에서 레벨마다 끊임없이 새로운 난관이 도사리는 플랫폼 형태의 악몽 같은 사원을 헤쳐나가며 사악한 악마인 레약의 여왕 랑다로부터 사랑하는 이를 구해야 합니다!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Escape from Naraka is a hellish first-person action platformer. Journey to another realm to save your beloved from an evil demon named Rangda the Leyak Queen and platform your way through a nightmarish temple where each level will challenge you again and again!

reviewHighlights.text: It’s fundamentally flawed in its design, creating an experience that feels harder than it needs to be. The precise platforming took me a while to get...
Decently hard game but still okay :)
